titles: Love in a mist; a loving couple once together met, and changing words, a passion did beget: a mist before my eyes I have, quoth she, what dost thou mean, my boy, to do with me: to the tune of, Hey boys up go we.
publisher: Printed for I[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel in Guiltspur-street.,
notes: Date, place of publication and publisher's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
keywords: Broadsides --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
